summary: THERE WAS AN INTERMITTENT PULL TO THE RIGHT.  THE PULLING WOULD BECOME MORE SEVERE WHEN TURNING TO THE RIGHT.  ON ONE OCCASION THE VEHICLE SWERVED VIOLENTLY TO THE RIGHT.  THE BRAKES WERE REPLACED BUT THE PROBLEM STILL EXISTED.  THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO FIND THE PROBLEM.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED THE DEALER  PAY FOR REPAIR.  SCC   *JB
